summary: Completed comprehensive testing of pagination feature for Content Library. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests passed - pagination controls display correctly with 'Showing X-Y of Z results', Previous/Next buttons work correctly (Previous disabled on page 1, Next disabled on last page), page numbers are clickable, and page 2 shows different content than page 1.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pagination feature fully tested and working. Backend endpoints support page and per_page query parameters. Free Books section has 62 total books, displaying 50 per page (2 pages total). Pagination controls show 'Showing X-Y of Z results' format. Previous button disabled on page 1, Next button disabled on last page. Page numbers are clickable. Children's Literature and Content Library Search also support pagination.

backend_pagination_api.free_books_default_pagination: PASS - Returns pagination fields (page, per_page, total, total_pages, has_next, has_prev)
backend_pagination_api.free_books_different_content: PASS - Page 1 and Page 2 have no overlapping books
backend_pagination_api.free_books_total_pages_calc: PASS - total_pages correctly calculated as ceil(62/50) = 2
backend_pagination_api.free_books_invalid_page: PASS - Page beyond total returns empty array
backend_pagination_api.free_books_search_pagination: PASS - Search endpoint returns pagination info
backend_pagination_api.childrens_literature_pagination: PASS - Children's literature endpoint returns pagination info
backend_pagination_api.content_library_search_pagination: PASS - General search endpoint returns pagination info
backend_pagination_api.pagination_with_category_filter: PASS - Pagination works with category filter
backend_pagination_api.pagination_with_grade_filter: PASS - Pagination works with grade filter

frontend_pagination_ui.pagination_controls_visible: PASS - Pagination controls displayed at bottom of Free Books section
frontend_pagination_ui.showing_x_y_of_z_format: PASS - Shows 'Showing 1-50 of 62 results' on page 1, 'Showing 51-62 of 62 results' on page 2
frontend_pagination_ui.previous_button_page_1: PASS - Previous button disabled (grayed out) on page 1
frontend_pagination_ui.next_button_page_1: PASS - Next button enabled on page 1
frontend_pagination_ui.previous_button_page_2: PASS - Previous button enabled on page 2
frontend_pagination_ui.next_button_page_2: PASS - Next button disabled (grayed out) on page 2 (last page)
frontend_pagination_ui.page_numbers_clickable: PASS - Page numbers 1 and 2 are clickable
frontend_pagination_ui.page_navigation_works: PASS - Clicking Next/Previous/page numbers navigates correctly
frontend_pagination_ui.different_content_per_page: PASS - Page 1 shows 50 books, Page 2 shows 12 different books
